sentence.Network_en: You flatter yourself. Why would we go to such ludicrous lengths?
sentence.Network_cn: 你真自以为是。我们为什么要费那么大的力气？

sentence.Network_en: You can make your stomach look flatter instantly by improving your posture.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过采取更好的坐姿，你的腹部马上就会看起来平坦一些。

sentence.Network_en: I flatter myself I've done it all rather well.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为自己已经做得相当好了。

list.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(52) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... flatten 变平 flatter oneself 自夸 flatter 过分夸赞.
胡敏读故事背雅思单词-搜狐教育 ... flange v. 给…装(或作)凸缘 flatter oneself n. 自信,自想,自以为 flaw n. 缺点;瑕疵.
常见汉语表达的... ... 没问题的。 I'll get by. 不敢当。 I'm flattered. 我不想让大家扫兴。 I didn't want to be a wet blanket.
flatter 平面锤flattered rivet 扁头铆钉flattie 平跟鞋
flattening mill 轧扁机flatter generator 噪声发生器flatter ribbon-like fibre 扁带状纤维

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: perhaps a back-formation from flattery

encyclopedia.content:
flatter英音：['flætə]美音：['flætɚ]   
以下结果由译典通提供词典解释　　及物动词 vt. 
　　1.谄媚;奉承[(+about/on)]
　　I guess he was just flattering me. 
　　我猜想他只是在奉承我。
　　2.使高兴,使感到满意[H]
　　She was greatly flattered by an invitation to visit the White House. 
　　她对受到邀请访问白宫感到很荣幸。
　　3.(相片,画等的形象)比(真人,实物)好看
　　This picture surely doesn't flatter my sister. 
　　我妹妹这张照片没有本人好看。 
　　This photo flatters him. 
　　这张照片比他本人漂亮。 
　　The picture certainly doesn't flatter you. 
　　你这张照片没有本人好看。
以下结果来自互联网网络释义　　flatter
　　1.平面锤
　　石油英语词汇(F3)[中国学习动力网]
　　flatter 平面锤
　　2.溜须拍马，奉承
　　flatter：溜须拍马，奉承

entry.def: If someone flatters you, they praise you in an exaggerated way that is not sincere, because they want to please you or to persuade you to do something.

example.ex: I knew she was just flattering me.
example.tran: 我知道她只是在恭维我。

example.ex: ...a story of how the president flattered and feted him into taking his side.
example.tran: 有关总统如何恭维并盛宴款待他、让他站到自己一边的故事

entry.def: If you flatter yourself that something good is the case, you believe that it is true, although others may disagree. If someone says to you 'you're flattering yourself' or 'don't flatter yourself', they mean that they disagree with your good opinion of yourself.

example.ex: I flatter myself that this campaign will put an end to the war...
example.tran: 我自认为这次战役将结束这场战争。

example.ex: I flatter myself I've done it all rather well...
example.tran: 我认为自己已经做得相当好了。

entry.def: If something flatters you, it makes you appear more attractive.

example.ex: Orange and khaki flatter those with golden skin tones...
example.tran: 橘黄色和卡其色能衬托那些金黄色皮肤的人。

example.ex: My philosophy of fashion is that I like to make clothes that flatter.
example.tran: 我的时尚理念就是我喜欢做让人穿着更显漂亮的衣服。

auth_sentence.content: I flatter and am flattered and both too easily.
auth_sentence.res_content: I flatter and am flattered and both too easily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I flatter and am flattered and both too easily.

auth_sentence.content: To flatter kings, or court the great.

auth_sentence.content: I didn't flatter myself that anyone was watching me.
auth_sentence.res_content: I didn't flatter myself that anyone was watching me.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =blow,表示"吹"; 2. =to spread,smooth,表示"使平滑,平整,扫平"

stems_affixes.word_buile: flat使平滑→adj.平坦的, 扁平的 v.[使]变平

stems_affixes.value_cn: 放气, 缩小, 通货紧缩, 物价低廉
stems_affixes.word_buile: deflate放气;缩小+ion表名词→n.放气, 缩小, 通货紧缩, 物价低廉
inflate膨胀+ion表名词→n.通货膨胀;胀大,夸张

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使[轮胎]瘪下去;放气, 缩小;降低重要性;紧缩通货

stems_affixes.word_buile: flat使平滑→adj.平坦的, 扁平的 v.[使]变平
flat使平滑+er反复做→不断使平滑,使别人高兴

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使通货膨胀,使物价上涨

sentences.cn: 这音乐使他听得很愉快。

jushi.english: The type of hair flatters her.
The pink dress flattered her figure.
jushi.chinese: 这件红色连衣裙使她的体形尽显窈窕。
